snippet: When budget cuts have loomed, politicians have long warned that the Washington Monument might have to be closed. That tactic is of limited value now, as it is closed for repairs.
abstract: Politicians have long warned Washington Monument might have to be closed if there is no agreement on federal budget; tactic, known as Washington Monument Syndrome, is of limited value in current budget fight because monument is closed indefinitely, due not to political brinkmanship but to an earthquake.
lead_paragraph: When budget cuts have loomed, politicians have long warned that the Washington Monument might have to be closed. That tactic is of limited value now, as it is closed for repairs.

headline.main: A Symbol of Liberty, Strength and Budget Fights
headline.print_headline: A Symbol of Liberty, Strength and Budget Fights
